title: cmd/gc: inlining and 6g -u interact badly
body:
When packages are being built with the safe bit, and functions are flagged for inlining,
you can get failures on the import lines.

make[1]: Entering directory `xxx/src/pkg/strconv'
6g -u   -p strconv -o _go_.6 atob.go atof.go atoi.go decimal.go extfloat.go ftoa.go
itoa.go quote.go
atof.go:15: cannot use unsafe.Pointer
make[1]: *** [_go_.6] Error 1
